SEARCH
Package rayrangers.raytracer.math

Class Vertex3D

java.lang.Object
rayrangers.raytracer.math.Vertex3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformable
public class Vertex3D extends Object implements Transformable
Represents a vertex in 3D space.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vertex3D(double x1, double x2, double x3)
    Class constructor specifying the coordinates of all dimensions.
    Vertex3D(double x1, double x2, double x3, Vector3D vec)
    Class constructor specifying the coordinates of all dimensions and the normal vector.
    Vertex3D(Vector3D locationVector)
    Class constructor for a vertex with a given location vector.
